amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the Syria Train and Equip program and apply the savings of $600 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce to $0 the Syria Train and Equip Fund, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clawson (FL) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 323 (Roll no. 343).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clawson (FL) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 323 (Roll no. 343).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Clawson (FL).
